articles.title: Vinyl record collecting is having a resurgence in Singapore – what does 'stan culture' have to do it? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From Teresa Teng to Billie Eilish, record collecting is enjoying a renaissance in Singapore. We asked the folks at Roxy Records, Wildflower Wax Co and Vinyl Kakis – who’s buying them and, more importantly, why?

articles.title: Celebrating Lunar New Year around the world - CBC.ca
articles.description: Asian people in Canada and around the world are celebrating Lunar New Year, which begins Sunday.
articles.content:
